name: Chutatip's Chicken Satay
ingredients: 2 pounds boneless chicken breast, about 4 breast halves
1 teaspoon soy sauce or fish sauce

instructions.en: Slice the chicken in thin strips. (It's easier to slice if partially frozen.)
Mix coconut milk, cilantro, curry powder, turmeric, Splenda, soy sauce or fish sauce, and oil in a bowl.
Add the sliced chicken to the marinade and mix well.
Marinate for at least 3 hours or overnight.
Thread the marinated chicken strips onto bamboo skewers.
Grill the skewers just until done, basting with the marinade while grilling. Do not overcook.

notes: This recipe makes about 6 servings. Can be frozen. Serve with Peanut Sauce for dipping and Cucumber Salad.
